channel.title: OpenPGP error
channel.description: I've just update my whonix (both Workstation and Gateway) and run whonixcheck. I got this message: [code]ERROR: Whonix News Download Result: Could not OpenPGP verify authenticity of Whonix News whonix_news.tar.xz!!! (gpg exit code: 2 | validsig: false) This is either, - a Whonix Bug, - an attack on Whonix, - or Whonix News Keys might be outdated. Upgrading using apt-get might fix this. [/code] Everything else is OK.

item.title: OpenPGP error
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
See this answer, this thread:
https://www.whonix.org/forum/index.php/topic,595.msg4576.html#msg4576

Read full topic

item.title: OpenPGP error
item.dc:creator: stranger98721
item.description:
Iâ€™ve just update my whonix (both Workstation and Gateway) and run whonixcheck.
I got this message:

[code]ERROR: Whonix News Download Result:
Could not OpenPGP verify authenticity of Whonix News whonix_news.tar.xz!!!
(gpg exit code: 2 | validsig: false)
This is either,

  • a Whonix Bug,
  • an attack on Whonix,
  • or Whonix News Keys might be outdated. Upgrading using apt-get might fix this. [/code]
    Everything else is OK.

Read full topic
